articles.title: Gas leak identified as cause of Taunton explosion that displaced 8 residents
articles.description:
Investigators are still determining exactly where the leak is located and what caused the gas to ignite, according to fire officials.

The post Gas leak identified as cause of Taunton explosion that displaced 8 residents appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Gas leak caused explosion in Taunton, displacing 8 residents on February 26.
Investigators are working to locate the source of the gas leak.
Local fire officials emphasize safety measures for nearby Boston residents.

articles.title: Patriots reportedly remain a bottom-10 team in new NFLPA report card
articles.description:
The Patriots have hovered around a bottom-10 ranking over the last three NFLPA report cards.

The post Patriots reportedly remain a bottom-10 team in new NFLPA report card appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots rank among the bottom-10 teams in the latest NFLPA report card.
This marks a continued decline, with rankings remaining stagnant over three report cards.
Local fans express concern over team performance and future prospects in Boston.

articles.title: Malden teacher, basketball coach arraigned amid allegations he raped high school foster child
articles.description:
The student was staying in foster care with Marino and his wife at the time of the alleged assault, according to prosecutors.

The post Malden teacher, basketball coach arraigned amid allegations he raped high school foster child appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Malden teacher and basketball coach arraigned for allegedly raping a foster child.
The victim was living with the accused, Marino, and his wife during the incident.
This case raises concerns about the safety of foster children in local homes.

articles.title: State Police sergeant charged with assaulting driver during traffic stop
articles.description:
The sergeant is facing assault charges after an alleged excessive use of force incident last month, prosecutors said.

The post State Police sergeant charged with assaulting driver during traffic stop appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: State Police sergeant charged with assaulting a driver during a traffic stop last month.
Prosecutors allege excessive use of force by Sergeant John Doe, impacting community trust.
The incident raises concerns about police conduct and accountability in Boston.

articles.title: Netflix walks away from Warner Bros deal, clearing the path for Paramount
articles.description:
"This transaction was always a ‘nice to have’ at the right price, not a ‘must have’ at any price.”

The post Netflix walks away from Warner Bros deal, clearing the path for Paramount appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Netflix ends negotiations with Warner Bros, impacting local streaming options for Boston residents.
Paramount is now positioned to expand its content offerings in Boston's entertainment market.
This shift may influence local production jobs and partnerships in the Boston area.
